movies.title: J. Edgar
movies.plot: As the face of law enforcement in the United States for almost 50 years, J. Edgar Hoover was feared and admired, reviled and revered. But behind closed doors, he held secrets that would have destroyed his image, his career, and his life.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 5 wins & 16 nominations.

events.title: an attempt is made on Attorney General Palmer's life
a bank teller spots a ransom bill with a license plate number written on it
Hoover has a letter sent to Martin Luther King
